user-nav.title: Manage your account settings and profile

signin.title: SignIn or Create an Account
signin.subtitle: Enter your email below to create your account
signin.agreement: By clicking continue, you agree to our
signin.button: Sign In with your Email - Temporary disabled

journals.title: Journals
journals.subtitle: Manage your journals
journals.new-journal-description: Create a new journal to start trading

journal-form.name-min: Name must be at least 5 characters long
journal-form.name-max: Name must be at most 30 characters long
journal-form.start-balance-required: Start balance must be a number
journal-form.name-placeholder: Enter a name for your journal
journal-form.currency-description: The selection will determine the currency used for all entries in this journal
journal-form.start-date-placeholder: Select a start date for your journal
journal-form.start-date-description: This is the date you start trade in this journal. This date will be used to calculate the balance of your journal
journal-form.start-balance-description: This is the balance you have in your account when you start trading in this journal. This balance will be used to calculate the balance of your journal
journal-form.start-balance-positive: Start balance must be greater than 0
journal-form.start-balance-max: Start balance must be less than 1000000000

entries.title: Trades
entries.subtitle: Manage your trades
entries.journal-missing-message: You need to create a journal before adding a trade

deposit-form.journal-description: The journal where this deposit will be inserted
deposit-form.date-placeholder: Select a date for this deposit
deposit-form.price-positive: Deposit value must be greater than 0
deposit-form.price-max: Deposit value must be less than 1000000000
deposit-form.description-max: Description must be at most 100 characters long
deposit-form.description-placeholder: Enter a description for this deposit

withdrawal-form.journal-description: The journal where this withdrawal will be inserted
withdrawal-form.date-placeholder: Select a date for this withdrawal
withdrawal-form.price-positive: Withdrawal value must be greater than 0
withdrawal-form.price-max: Withdrawal value must be less than 1000000000
withdrawal-form.description-max: Description must be at most 100 characters long
withdrawal-form.description-placeholder: Enter a description for this withdrawal

taxes-form.journal-description: The journal where this fee will be inserted
taxes-form.date-placeholder: Select a date for this fee
taxes-form.price-positive: Fee value must be greater than 0
taxes-form.price-max: Fee value must be less than 1000000000
taxes-form.description-max: Description must be at most 100 characters long
taxes-form.description-placeholder: Enter a description for this fee

dividend-form.journal-description: The journal where this dividend will be inserted
dividend-form.date-placeholder: Select a date for this dividend
dividend-form.price-positive: Dividend value must be greater than 0
dividend-form.price-max: Dividend value must be less than 1000000000
dividend-form.description-max: Description must be at most 100 characters long
dividend-form.description-placeholder: Enter a description for this dividend

trade-form.journal-description: The journal where this trade will be inserted
trade-form.size-positive: Size value must be greater than 0
trade-form.size-max: Size value must be less than 1000000000
trade-form.date-placeholder: Select a date for this trade
trade-form.price-positive: Trade value must be greater than 0
trade-form.price-max: Trade value must be less than 1000000000
trade-form.description-max: Description must be at most 100 characters long
trade-form.description-placeholder: Enter a description for this trade
trade-form.profit-description: The take profit value of this trade
trade-form.profit-positive: Take profit value must be greater than 0
trade-form.profit-max: Take profit value must be less than 1000000000
trade-form.loss-description: The stop loss value of this trade
trade-form.loss-positive: Stop loss value must be greater than 0
trade-form.loss-max: Stop loss value must be less than 1000000000
trade-form.exit-date-description: The date when you closed this trade
trade-form.exit-date-placeholder: Select a date for close this trade
trade-form.exit-date-after-date: Exit date must be after trade date
trade-form.exit-price-description: The value when you closed this trade
trade-form.exit-price-positive: Exit value must be greater than 0
trade-form.exit-price-max: Exit value must be less than 1000000000
trade-form.costs-description: The value of costs for this trade
trade-form.costs-positive: Costs value must be greater than 0
trade-form.costs-max: Costs value must be less than 1000000000

pagination.rows-count: {count, plural, =0 {none row} =1 {1 row} other {# rows}} in total.
